isStripEnabled.description: Whether the led strip is enabled

brightness.description: Brightness of the strip (0 = black, 100.0 = max. brightness)

amountLeds.description: The amount of led's on the led strip

isStaticColor.description: Whether the strip shows a static color or not

staticColor.description: Hex-code of static led strip color. The current default color is this nostalgic yellow color of old radios
